name: Furiends
description:
Ready to meet your new best furiend? Adopt your very own Augmented Reality dog in Furiends!

These dogs need homes and loving owners to take care of them. It's up to you to play, feed, walk, and clean up after your dog.

Bring your dog with you wherever you go! With the latest Augmented Reality technology, you'll never need to worry about leaving that sad face home alone again.

Stay active! Through our integration with Apple Health App, Furiends tracks your steps and converts it into "Furcoins," which are used to buy food, treats, toys, etc. The healthier and more active you are, the more you can spoil your pet.

Bond with your new pet! The stronger the connection between you and your Furiend, the more unique items will be available to you. Dress your dog up in all kinds of realistic and fantastic clothing and accessories, including a cozy sweater, doctors scrubs, or even an astronaut uniform! There are countless outfit combinations for you to try on in Furiends. Don't forget to snap a picture and post on social media!
